data.title: International singing competition
data.text:
The live auditions 2024 have officially started!

With the official start of the pre-selections for our NEUE STIMMEN Competition 2024, the stage is set for the next generation of aspiring opera talents.

Now that our jury has successfully selected the most convincing singers from over 1000 applications, the competition is heading into the next round with the live auditions.

Congratulations to all participants, who now have the opportunity to sing live in front of our international jury.

The first live auditions already took place: London, Amsterdam and New York were the first three stops on our journey. You can catch a glimpse behind the scenes of the auditions on our Instagram channel.

We are looking forward to this exciting time and wish all the singers the best of luck.

Click here for our Insta

Extension of the application phase

NEW deadline:

The application phase for the 2024 competition has been extended until the 11th of February 2024. For all those who have not yet applied: Use the time and submit your application! You can find all information about the application under How to: How to apply & good to know.

How to apply & good to know

Creating Careers Workshops

NEUE STIMMEN stands for the long-lasting support of opera singers and their careers - also beyond the International Singing Competition and the International Master Class.

We are currently in the process of expanding our "Creating Careers" workshop offering. We offer two workshops on the topics "Contract Law" and "Tax Law". Led by Uwe Steinkamp, an experienced legal expert, both workshops will provide you with the knowledge you need to safely manage your financial and contractual affairs as an opera singer.

Sign up now! For more information visit our career page.

More info on the workshops

NEUE STIMMEN meets Beethovenfest Bonn

"Freude, schöner Götterfunken!" - Three familiar faces delighted the audience on Sunday at the International Beethovenfest Bonn, one of the oldest and most important classical music festivals in Germany. Together with the Deutsches Symphonie-Orchester Berlin, the Philharmonic Choir of the City of Bonn and tenor Matthew Newlin (who stepped in for NEUE STIMMEN alumni Zachary Rioux, who fell ill at short notice), final round participants of the last competition Francesca Pia Vitale, Eugénie Joneau and Ossian Huskinson performed Beethoven's well-known Ninth Symphony. Under the direction of the renowned conductor Cornelius Meister, they once again had the opportunity to present themselves and their skills to an international audience. The concert provided a brilliant finale to the opening weekend of Bonn's large-scale event.

International Beethovenfest Bonn

Our Masterclass 23/24

May we introduce: Our NEUE STIMMEN Masterclass 23/24. These 13 young singers will come to Gütersloh in October to spend a week working with renowned coaches and learning with and from each other. Everything culminates at the end of the week with a festive final concert in front of over 350 guests from culture, business and society. After the Masterclass 2020 took place in digital form for the first time due to the pandemic, it will present itself in a special form for its 25th anniversary, for which we were able to win renowned partner institutions: in addition to the week in Gütersloh, all young talents will get the opportunity to participate in a "mixed reality" opera production at the Staatstheater Augsburg in spring 2024, where they will learn digital performance techniques in workshops and literally experience theater in a new dimension. In fall 2024, some of our participants will travel to Positano, on the Gulf of Naples, to work with young up-and-coming pianists at the invitation of the Wilhelm Kempff Foundation, and to showcase the results of their work there.

Our Singers

Recap Prize Winners Concert

On May 23, our prize winners' concert finally took place again in Berlin. Exactly five years to the day after the last winners' concert, we were guests for the first time in the "Apollosaal" of the Staatsoper Unter den Linden. Our six finalists of the international singing competition Francesca Pia Vitale, Carles Pachon, Sakhiwe Mkosana, Yewon Han, Marvic Monreal and Dumitru Mitu inspired the audience. A big thank you to Marvic Monreal, who jumped in at short notice for Eugénie Joneau.

Find the German press release here

Masterclass Series 2023/24

We’re happy to finally announce that we will hold a Masterclass again this year.

On the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the format, there will be a special edition this year: Masterclass Series 2023/24!

Apart from to the traditional Masterclass week in Gütersloh, singers will also have the opportunity to take part in a “mixed reality“ opera production at the Staatstheater Augsburg in spring 2024 and to travel to Positano, Italy to work together with young pianists at the invitation of the Wilhelm Kempff Foundation and to present the results at a small local festival.

Find more information here

The final concert in full length

For those who missed the final concert or just want to enjoy it again in full length, check out our Neue Stimmen YouTube playlist! There you can also find all concert arias individually. So if you want to relive Dumitru Mitu's "E lucevan le stelle" or Marvic Monreal's "Mon coeur s'ouvre à ta voix", or maybe one of the winning arias (Carles Pachon's "Largo al factotum" perhaps?!): This way...

Find the playlist here

Our winners 2022

These are our winners! Francesca Pia Vitale from Italy, who also won the audience award, and Carles Pachon from Spain are the winners of Neue Stimmen 2022.

Second place went to Eugénie Joneau and Sakhiwe Mkosana, and third place went to Yewon Han and Dumitru Mitu. The Brian Dickie Young Talent Award was presented again this year, and went to the young South Korean Taehan Kim. The jury also awarded two "Talent Development Prizes" for the first time. The tenor Zachary Rioux from Canada and the soprano Parchiyachart Sitthidamrongkarn from Thailand can be pleased about it. This prize is sponsored by the Mascarade Opera Studio and the Fondazione Mascarade in Florence. The prize includes a stay of up to three weeks in Florence with the opportunity to join the opera studio there on a permanent basis.

Read the press release here

Our Finalists

11 singers have made it to the finals concert of this year's competition. We are very excited! Congrats to Marcela Rahal, Eugénie Joneau, Sakhiwe Mkosana, Francesca Pia Vitale, Alma Neuhaus, Lilit Davtyan, Dumitru Mitu, Yewon Han, Marvic Monreal, Carles Pachon (left to right) and Seungwoo Simon Yang (missing on the photo).

The final concert will take place on June 30 - the link to the livestream can be found here on the website.

The press release

Meet our singers 2022!

The wait is over. After an intensive selection phase, they have been chosen! We are very pleased to finally be able to present our final round participants 2022. In June, 36 singers will come to Gütersloh to prove their talent once again. On our overview you can find all singers with headshot, biography and some backstage information. In the course of April, we will introduce all singers in more detail on our social media channels. If you don't want to miss it, feel free to check us out on Instagram and Facebook.

Click here for the listing

NEW DATE Final Round 2022!

The final round of NEUE STIMMEN 2021/22 competition will be moved from March to June. This decision has not been taken lightly, but our responsibility for the welfare of all people involved must be our priority considering rising infection rates in Germany. The new date for the final round will be June 26-30, 2022, which will take place in a shortened format. Thus, the semifinal concert will be cancelled, the auditions as well as the final concert with orchestral accompaniment will remain as usual. We will provide timely information about ticket sales for the final concert as well as streaming of the concert here on the website and on our social media channels. An adjusted weekly overview of the event can be found on the “News Competition 2022” page.

Click here for the News page

Neue Stimmen alumni dinner in Frankfurt

Last week we had the kick-off of the Live Auditions in Frankfurt. This opportunity was used to have a small alumni meeting with our singers in Frankfurt the night before. With us were Ekin Su Paker, Marvic Monreal, Iurii Samoilov and Bianca Andrew. Jury member Brain Dickie also joined the little event. It was a great evening with lots of laughter and stories. After successful live auditions in Frankfurt, Paris and London will follow this week from the total of 12 pre-selection locations.

Follow us on Instagram

Congrats on round 2!

After an exciting application phase, in which all participants submitted two videos with their online application for the first time, we were finally thrilled to receive over 1400 applications.

Our jury now had time to review all the documents and videos and had to make the difficult decision of who to admit to the live auditions. The overall level was very high. All singers received an email at the beginning of August, for some of them with the long-awaited information: Next stop --> Live Audition!

The first one will be in Frankfurt on September 28th.

All live audition cities

Application open till June 13

We know it has not been easy to record arias with live piano accompaniment during this time. In certain countries there have been renewed lockdowns due to the ongoing pandemic. We want to give singers in these places a chance to enter the competition and decided to postpone the deadline for applications until June 13.

How to apply?

DIARY

We are very happy to finally present to you our new "Diary" on our website. Both our talented singers and our knowledgeable project partners get the chance to share their experiences, challenges and inspirations from their artistic lives. We, Dorothea and Vera from the NEUE STIMMEN team, will kick things off. Check it out - we are excited!

To the Diary it's this way

Tutorial Video

Here is our first NEUE STIMMEN tutorial!

Find out in seven steps how to produce a good audition video. Have fun watching - and give it a try yourself. Remember you will need to record and submit two videos along with your online application for the competition 2021. Applications start on 1 January, 2021. Happy to see you soon!

Watch tutorial

Masterclass 2020

Due to the current situation, our Masterclass 2020 will be held exclusively in digital form this year. For this reason the Open Masterclasses in Gütersloh unfortunately have to be cancelled. On our Master Class page you can find new content from the end of October, now there are still some videos of the latest masterclasses, i.e. with John Norris or Michelle Breedt. Have fun!
